text:
Visited Dr Benjamin Koh today for a simple cleaning appointment. However, he still took his time to perform his job meticulously, patiently explaining each step he is about to take. His kindness and empathy shows when talking to his assistant or patient. Truly one of the most remarkable dentist I have met. Overall was an extremely pleasant visit and would make him my regular dentist.

Would recommend Dr Koh to anyone looking for quality dental care over anything else.

Done my 6 monthly scaling and polishing at T32 Dental at Clementi with Dr Benjamin Koh. He takes time in explaining the procedure and also the informed what steps is he going to take next. He demonstrates patience and gentleness in his work. The staffs at the reception were also very helpful. During my visit, there was senior citizen who ask about the clinic services and the lady at the reception was very friendly and take time to assist them.
Great attitude and service to their patients.

Dr. Huang is very gentle, patient, and compassionate with my son. The procedure went smoothly. It was his first visit to the clinic, but we felt my son was well taken care of, and all our concerns were thoroughly addressed. I highly recommend this clinic and Dr. Huang for her expertise and professionalism.

My son was experiencing severe toothaches, and Dr Huang handled it with great care and patience. She took the time to explain everything clearly, making my son feel at ease throughout the treatment. Thank you for your excellent care! Highly recommend!
I have been seeing Dr Huang for about 2 years now and I highly recommend her! She is attentive, meticulous and gentle. The service staff are also very friendly and helpful.
